# PAD::ENABLE_CONTROL_ACTION

## Parameters
* **CONTROL_TYPE** control
* **CONTROL_ACTION** action
* **BOOL** enableRelatedActions = true:
Is true, related inputs will also be enabled.
For example, enabling INPUT_SELECT_WEAPON will also enable INPUT_SELECT_WEAPON_UNARMED (and others) so the weapon can be selected by the other means.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
control: see IS_CONTROL_ENABLED
